div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxixo die
maij quo Supra

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid
menyes forspekar that William litstar Scherar' sal content and pay to peter
mallert franchman xxj stane of woll gude and Sufficient merchand'
gude and xxtj crovnis of money or thurisday that nixt cumis
or' nowne

The secunde day of June the yer' forsaide Alexander sclatar oblist him be the fath
of his bodie to content and pay to James colison' his ayris executouris or assignais
xxxiij barrelis of beir' and demi bollis of this ber' now in his berne and yarde and tene
barrelis of beir' at martymes next to Cum and vthir tene barrelis ber' at yule next thareftir
to the pament of the said' xxtj barrelis he has assignit to the said' James al his beir'
savin this yer' within the fredome of this burghe And' atour the saide alexander has
set and to formaling' lattin to the saide James his berne and malthous' with
the quartar of the yard' nerrast the berne liand in the greyne for thre yeris fra
this day furtht male and annuellis Rentis and Rud' malys fre the saide
alexander his ayris or assigniz' payand al Rude malis and annuellis and vphalding
It deuly wattirthik as efferis and he sal pay to the saide James xiiij s'
in money and werk betuix this and the fest of Natiuite of Sanct John
the baptist next to cum And' to the fulfilling and keping' Ande pament
of ale thar thingis alewritin the said' Alexander oblist him his ayris and assignez'
be the fathtis of thar bodiis befor William Wormet ane of the ballieis Syme
lyp and me sere Johne Stirueling notar public'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Junij anno quo Supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Walterus
pyot est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Walterj pyot patris
suj

The said' day Jonet traile lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit to ansuer' to Jonet Westland' and cristiane Westland' Anent
thar' gudis of ayrschip tharfor the aldirman and balyeis ordanit to warne
the saide Jonet to monunday that next cumis to ansuer' to the said'
personis

Eodem die Dauid Colp fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Willelmum
colp patrem suum procuratorem suum legittimum in omnibus suis actionibus querelis
et causis ipsum tangentibus motis seu monendis In quibuscumque et coram
quibuscumque prosequend' Agend' et defendend' promittd' promittend' de Rato et grato
cum Ceteris clausulis et terminis necessariis et Oportunis et cetera

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsele forspekar that Jonhne philp Is quyt of the male of the
Witsonday terme last bigan of the hous' that he hed' in tak of William
buchane becaus' the said' William Intromettit with the said' hous'
befor martymes Ande safar' as the said' Jonhne cane preyve pait
of the martimes maile It salbe allowit to him and he sal pay It that
he preuis nocht pait or the gudis be Removit out of the grond' And'
thareftir he preuit with thome Ridale x s' pait of the said' martymes
maile

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo die
mensis Junij anno quo Supra

The said' day the ballieis assignit this day xv days to thomas
buchane to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin apone him be Dauy broys'
in his name and Elene lundoris his assedator for the wranguys' haldin
fra thame of ix li' ane barrell of Salmond' and ane wob of quhit
clatht'

the said' day It was ordanit be ane assis' Alexander red' forspekar that megy
hay the wif of gilbert tulidef sal pay j li' of wax to the haly
blud' licht for the offence done to William blinsel et cetera

the saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais the xxi day
of June Instant to Jonhne Wormet to ansuer to Jonhne Knollis
for the wranguys' haldin fra him of xviij barrellis salmond' and ane barrele
of girls' eftir the tenor' of ane writ subscriuit with mastir Jonhne bade
naghis hand'

The said' day Jonhne fechat lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borghe' fundin apone him be Jonhne Retre for the wrang
uys' haldin fra him of xviij s' tharfor the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj seriand'
to pas' and tak ane stres' to compt and Rekning

The said' day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais the xxj day
of this Instant monetht of June to Jonhne Wormet to Ansuer'
to the borghe strekit one him be Jonhne Knollis for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane barrel Salmond' and ane barrel of girls'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Octavo die Junij
quo Supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit Wednysday the xxiij day of
this Instant monetht of June of Johne of Cullan to ansuer' to the borghe'
Strekit one him be Alexander menyes that Jonhne of Cullan hed' wrangit
In the doing' of certan artikillis schevin be him in writ

the said' day Jonhne of Cullane protestit that he suld' nocht ansuer' bot tile ane
artikill the said' day that he is warnit to

Eodem die Jacobus Colisone fecit constituit creauit et nominavit magistrum Johannem
badenaghe vicarium de gemry gilbertum menyes Johannem Colisone thomam
Waus et Duncanum colisone coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos et Indubitatos procuratores actores et
factores ad obiciendum que breue seu breuia Impetrat' seu Inpetrand' per margaretam
fechat Ac in omnibus aliis et singulis actionibus causis et querelis ipsum tangentibus
aut tangere valen' motis seu monendis In quibuscumque et contra quoscumque Agend'
respondendend' defendend' prosequend'

Septimo die
Septimo die mensis Junij anno quo Supra
Alexander menyes Alexander Rede Willelmus chamer Duncanus colisone Johannes
falconar Robertus Crag alexander prat patricius Rede alexander lindesay
Johannes Steuinsone georgius byssat patricius chernsid' et Dauid
fynne burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Andreas lyntone
pater lyntone latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente in le futy
Inter terram quondam Nicholaij yonge ex boreali ex vna et communionem pasturam
dicti burgi le linkis ex australi partibus ab altera Et quod dictus est
legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Andree patris suj de dicta terra
cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta dicta terra valet nunc per
annum decim s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit
In manibus domini nostri Regis per dimidium annj aut eocirca per mortem
dicti Andree patris suj in defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime
prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die Junij quo supra

the said' day Jame myll conuikit be ane Suorne assis' patry leslie
forspekar for stribulance of Anny wif to Jonhne litstar in the grene for the
quhilk he was in Ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and was ordanit to pay
demi li' wax to the haly blud' licht Ande gif euire he committis ony offence
to ony sic persone in tyme to Cum to pay j li' wax to the said' licht

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo die
Junij quo Supra

The said' day sere Androw coupar Oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie to content and pay yerlie to Jok of fyf tuenty
Schillingis at pasche next to Cum or within aucht
dais thareftir at the farrast Ande say furtht yerlie
Ilkan yer' for the ourgevin of the Clerkschip of the
gallougat for the clerkschip of the gastraw for Wille
Coupar his brothir Ande gif the saide sere Androw falyeis
In pament of the said' xxtj s' or ony part of It at
ony of the said' termes thane the saide Jok fyf sale
haue for Regres' Agan to the said' clerkschip of the
gallougate

add.foreign: Rutherfurd' prepositus Waus mar et balliuus

div.p:
The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' aldirman askit at Johne of mar'
the balye xxxv li' quhilkis he hede in his hande of the lord erskenis
pensione of the yer' of gode jM and fiwe hundretht yeris that he mycht
fre the tone of the saide yeris maile quhilkis the saide balye grantit to
pay and Oblist him tharto / quhilkis xxxv li' being pait the aldirman grantit
to pay the haill male of the saide yer' and fre the tone tharof

add.foreign: deposiciones testium inter Robertum blinsel et Johannem callat

div.p:
Jonhne Retre deponit he saw Dauy blinsele resaue iij barrelis salmond' out of Johne Callatis
hous' merkit with Robert blinsellis merk and he herd' Johne of callat byd' the said' Dauid reseue
the tothir iij barrelis salmond' out of his hous' and he saw Dauid blinsel pikill tham and demayn'
the samyn as his avne fische and syne he saw that iij barrellis Salmond' tane for' dett aving
to ane Callit Johne Scheuale be Dauy blinsell And' the said' Dauy said to him he
hed' sellit the said' Salmond' and entirit tham in the vecinity in the kingis bukis as his
avne gudis

Patry Rede deponit that Dauy blinsel Intromettit with sex barrellis of Salmond' and entirit tham
in the vecinity in the kingis bukis as his avne gudis and pikillit tham And' gif ane of tham
tile his oyst quhar' he was at innys And' he sauld' j barrel to John fransis and gef
j barrel to the mastir for his fraucht And' the tothir iij barrel' was prefit for the said' Dauidis dettis Atour
he deponit that Johne callat hed' sellit tham for Robert blinsellis profit and Dauy blinsel wald'
nocht latt him

Duncan crak deponit that saw Dauy blinsele Intromettit with ij barrelis and demi of Salmond' tharof he
sellit j barrel and gaf j barrel to the oyst of his Innes and gaf demi barrel to gilyeam de buris and thre
barrellis was presit for the said' Dauid dettis to Johne Scheuall

Cristy prat deponit he saw Dauy blinsel resaue sax barrelis salmond' fra Johne callat
merkit with Robert blinsellis merk and entirit tham in the vecinity in the kingis bukis
as his avne gudis and pikillit tham / And' deliuerit j barrel for his costis j barrel he sellit and
gaf j barrel to the mastir for his fraucht And' thre barrelis salmond' was prefit for his dettis

Robert moyses deponit that Dauy blinsele gaf j barrel salmond' to his oyst
for his costis and he saw him sel j barrel salmond' and gif to Johne franseis
the half of the Siluer and hald the tothir demi to him Self And' saw him tak
pikill fra Duncan crak to pikill the said' Salmond' with

Alexander horne deponit he saw Dauy blinsele tak pikile fra Duncan Crak and pikile
iiij barrelis with And' the said' Dauid Intromettit with tham And' the said' Dauid gaf j barrel to
his oystes / he sallit j barrel / And' four' barrellis he saw him pikile And' he herd'
the said' Dauy say he hed' bene at the vecinty and endit his erandis

The said' day the balyeis continevit the end' of this sex barrelis salmond' clamit
be the procuratouris of Robert blinsele quhile the xix day of this Instant monetht
and than but delay the said' matir to be determit be caus' Johne callat
franchman is to saile his viagis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die
Junij quo Supra

the said' day laurence le croice franchman grantit him pait of
ale merchandice and gudis aucht to him be Jonhne of Cullane
of the quhilkis he dischargit the said Johne his ayris executouris and assignais
now and foreuire

The said day It is appoyntit betuix Johne' pyot for Richerd his sone on'
that ane part and Wille myln' one that vthir part that the breif of Inquest Raisit be the
said Richerd sal pas' tile ane assis' and quhilk of thame that optenis the land
sall sal gif ane forbutht to the tothir partj and Infeft him tharintile heretablie
be the sicht of gilbert menyes and ser Jhon' stirueling' annuellis and kingis
maile fre to the kepin' of the quhilkis butht the said' partiis was oblist
be the fathtis of thar' bodiis

The said' day the court wardit It was schevin for law ande gevin for
dome that Johne callat franchman Is quyt and fre of the clame of Sex
barrellis of Salmond' clamyt and persewit apone him be Robert blinsell
eftir the deposicionis of certane witnes producit suorne and deponit tharapon'

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Elene top
div.p:
Dauid menyes Alexander chamer Alexander Rede Johannes Wormet gilbertus menyes
Willelmus blinsel thomas Waus patricius Rede Johannes thomsone Dauid fynne
Willelmus goldsmitht patricius leslie Johannes Stewinsone patricius chernsid' malcomus
crag Duncanus craik et Dauid Kyntor burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam
Marioriata top filia patruj Elene top latricis presencium Obiit vltimo vestita et sasita
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum
de abirdene in vico furcarum ex Occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram georgei bysset ex
australi ex vna et terram Johannis litstar ex boreali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus
Oriens et lacum dicti burgi versus occidens Et quod dicta Elena est legittima et propinquior
heres dicte quondam mariote filie patruj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xiij s' iiij d' Et tantum valuit
tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existet In manibus domini nostri Regis per Spacium dimidij annj aut eocirca
per mortem dicte quondam mariote In defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque nunc
prosequentis datum et clausum

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Jacobus lundoris frater Elene lundoris latricis obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus / ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra
tam anterioreque Interiore Cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram thome ymlow ex australi et terram Duncanj talyour ex boreali
Et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et quod dicta Elena est legittima et
propinquior heres dicti quondam Jacobi fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum xiij s' et iiij d' Et tantum
valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per
seruicium burgagium Et nunc existet In manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium
quinque mensium aut eocirca per mortem dicti quondam Jacobi fratris suj defectu
veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datum et clausum

The saide day the consale and diuersis of the communite of the tone
present for the tyme grantit consentit and ordanit that sere Johne
Srachin be akit tua merkis in the yer' of thar' common'
gudis to his fee and to mak him sex markis in the yer'
for his gude seruice to be done in thar queir' and kirk

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes mylne auus Ricardi pyot latoris
presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra burgum antedictum In vico
Cas furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram' terram
ex australi ex vna et terram quam thomas mar' possidebat ex boriali
patribus ab altera et Communiones vias Regias versus Oriens et Occidens
Et quod dictus Ricardus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Johannis auj suj
de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis
valet nunc per annum x s' et valuit v s' tempore pacis Et tenetur in capite
de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus
domini nostri Regis per spacium decim mensium aut eocirca In defectu verj heredis
Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
tercio die mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo primo

add.note: This heading is placed in between this entry and the next, and may be taken to apply to both.

div.p:
The said day the ballies assignit friday that nixt cumis to Johne of cullan
to ansuer peremptourlie to the borght strekit one him be Alexander menyeis
and William scrimgeour officiar chargit the said Johne to Comper the said day
to ansuer to the said borgh' peremptourly and als the ballies assignit the day
to Alexander menyeis to folow the said borgh' and ordand the copy tharof to be gevin
to the said Johne of Cullan

the saide day Jonhne Cullane protestit that he suld' ansuer'
to the borghe fundin one him one friday that next cumis be alexander
menyes as law will and nay forthir
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die Junij

the saide day the ballieis continevit the borghe fundin one Jonhne
of cullane be alexander menyes quhill the sext day of July nixt to cum

The said' day In presence of Johne mar' ane of the ballieis of Abirdene
Richerd' litstar Oblist' him his ayris executouris and assignez' be al thar
landis and gudis to warand' kep and defende thomas meldrum burges
of the said' burghe his ayris executoris and skathles anent the Some of
four' merkis pait be him to margaret traill and Jonet litstar in hir' name
for' ane demi of wast pece of land' liande in the skilkillskulhill but
fraud' or gill
